lead_paragraph: A commemoration in Poland was originally billed as a Western alternative to a military parade planned by Vladimir V. Putin, but with a cease-fire in Ukraine, few want to pointedly snub him.

headline.print_headline: Alternative to Moscow Event Is Low-Key
headline.main: Poland’s World War II Ceremonies Lose Some Edge as Tensions With Russia Ebb

snippet: A commemoration in Poland was originally billed as a Western alternative to a military parade planned by Vladimir V. Putin, but with a cease-fire in Ukraine, few want to pointedly snub him.
abstract: Poland commemorates 70th anniversary of end of World War II in Gdansk, where the war started.
